data.value:
{{queries.6f85d571-8bcd-4752-9a7c-7a1ba8ecc04e.data
  .filter((e) =>
    (components.8924df93-2fe1-437d-a6ff-5b3ea2abaab9.value || e.lts_release_tag) &&
    (!components.1ce1e04d-6be5-4e03-9bea-40d865256225.value ||
      e.title.toLowerCase().includes(components.1ce1e04d-6be5-4e03-9bea-40d865256225.value.toLowerCase()) ||
      e.description.toLowerCase().includes(components.1ce1e04d-6be5-4e03-9bea-40d865256225.value.toLowerCase())) &&
    e.is_self_hosted &&
    (!components.b7f82719-832e-4a30-a0c9-15a101e7a355.values.length || (e.release_category &&
      components.b7f82719-832e-4a30-a0c9-15a101e7a355.values.some(category =>
        e.release_category.toLowerCase().split(',').map(s => s.trim()).includes(category.toLowerCase())
      ))) && 
    queries.97eef5f3-08ad-4bff-94b5-f57c5f545b40.data.includes(e.tag || e.lts_release_tag)
  )
  .sort((a, b) =>
    moment(b.published_date_sh, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - moment(a.published_date_sh, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
  )}}

schema.value:
{{queries.a6e53e39-46b1-4dd5-8e03-9596956d3518.data
    .filter(note => components.8924df93-2fe1-437d-a6ff-5b3ea2abaab9.value || !!note.lts_release_tag)
    .sort((a, b) => a.tag.localeCompare(b.tag))
    .filter((option, index, self) => index === self.findIndex((t) => t.tag === option.tag))
    .map(option => ({
        label: option.tag,
        value: option.tag,
        disable: false,
        visible: true,
        default: option.tag === 'v3.0.0-ee-lts' 
    }))}}

text.value: Keep up to date with the latest improvements in ToolJet!
